entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
